column1: NGR is the rectory. Altitudes match. 1940s record has an NGR of SO181237, which is too high and not near the rectory. Gauge moved 300 yards S 1 Nov 1945 to school house.
Combined readings in 1906 for Jun/Jul = 2.80 and Sep/Oct = 5.20. For 1918 Aug/Sep 1919 =9.60 and Sep/Oct = 6.80
1911 readings are noted as being corrected for date of reading for several unspecified months; readings left in this record.
Jan 1941 reading estimated for snow; left in this record
